song_lyrics: Jene sparshe re pāme pātak nāsh... padhāryā 1
Vege nāse re moh māyānā pāsh... padhāryā 2
Shuk Shārad re muni Nārad gāy... padhāryā 3
Jem ulūkne re ravi nav dekhāy... padhāryā 4
Satya karvā re pote laī muni sāth... padhāryā 5
Bhakti gnān vairāgya, sthāpyā grahī hāth... padhāryā 6
title: Karī karuṇā re Swāmī Sahajānand

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-760: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
